00039 RefreshMgr::RefreshMgr()
00040 {
00041     nextRefresh = 0;
00042     currentRankNo = 0;
00043     currentRowNo = 0;           
00044 }
00045

00047  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00055

00058 /*
00059  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060  *       Class:  RefreshMgr
00061  *      Method:  process_event
00062  * Description:  
00063  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064  */
00065 void RefreshMgr::process_event(IrisEvent* e)
00066 {
00067     IrisEvent *event = new IrisEvent();
00068     Request *req = new Request();
00069     req->cmdType = REFRESH;
00070     req->rankNo = currentRankNo;
00071     req->rowNo = currentRowNo;  
00072     currentRankNo = (currentRankNo + 1) % NO_OF_RANKS;
00073     if (currentRankNo == 0)
00074         currentRowNo = (currentRowNo + (ROW_SIZE*NO_OF_RANKS/8192)) % NO_OF_ROWS;               
00075     reqPtr->busHandler->LowLevelCmdGen(req);    
00076     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)               
00077     {
00078         event->src = (Component*)this;
00079         event->dst = (Component*)(&reqPtr->busHandler->cmdIssuer[i]);
00080         event->type = START;
00081  //     event->event_data.push_back((void*)req);
00082         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &CmdIssuer::process_event, (CmdIssuer*)event->dst, event);   
00083     }
00084 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00085 cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": Refresh Manager: Now I am sending all bank refresh command to cmd queue for rank: " << req->rankNo << ", row: " << req->rowNo << " of all channels simultaneously\n";     
00086 #endif
00087     nextRefresh = static_cast<ullint>(REFRESH_INC);     
00088     IrisEvent *event2 = new IrisEvent();
00089     event2->src = (Component*)this;
00090     event2->dst = (Component*)this;                     
00091     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+nextRefresh, &RefreshMgr::process_event, (RefreshMgr*)event2->dst, event2);    
00092     delete req; 
00093     delete e;
00094 }
